name: whatsapp-floating-plugin
description: A plugin to integrate WhatsApp floating chat using react-floating-whatsapp.

scripts.postbuild: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp -r css dist/ && cp -r templates dist/ && cp whatsapp-floating-plugin.php dist/ && cp -r js dist/
scripts.zip: npm run build && npm run postbuild && cd dist && zip -r ../whatsapp-floating-plugin.zip . && cd .. && npm run clean

author: Lennart Takanen
